# SpeechTranscriber.ReportingOption.volatileResults

**Case**

Provides tentative results for an audio range in addition to the finalized result.

## Declaration

```swift
case volatileResults
```

## Discussion

The transcriber will deliver several results for an audio range as it refines the transcription.

## Reporting options

- **SpeechTranscriber.ReportingOption.alternativeTranscriptions**: Includes alternative transcriptions in addition to the most likely transcription.
- **SpeechTranscriber.ReportingOption.fastResults**: Biases the transcriber towards responsiveness, yielding faster but also less accurate results.
